Verses: 1 eesaakku Yaakkobai Azhaiththu, Avanai Aaseervadhiththu, Nee Kaanaaniyarudaiya Kumaaraththigalil Penkollaamal,

2 ezhundhu Purappattu, Padhaan Araamilirukkira Un Thaayinudaiya Thagappanaagiya Peththuveludaiya Veettukkuppoi, Avvidaththil Un Thaayin Sagodharanaagiya Laabaanin Kumaaraththigalukkul Penkol Endru Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittaan.
3 sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevan Unnai Aaseervadhiththu, Nee Pala Janakkoottamaagumpadi Unnaip Palugavum Perugavumpanni;

4 dhevan Aabiragaamukkuk Koduththadhum Nee Paradhesiyaaith Thangugiradhumaana Dhesaththai Nee Sudhandhariththukkollumpadi Aabiragaamukku Aruliya Aaseervaadhaththai Unakkum Un Sandhadhikkum Aruluvaaraaga Endru Solli;

5 eesaakku Yaakkobai Anuppivittaan. Appozhudhu Avan Padhaan Araamilirukkum Seeriyaa Dhesaththaanaagiya Peththuveludaiya Kumaaranum, Thanakkum Esaavukkum Thaayaagiya Rebekkaalin Sagodharanumaana Laabaanidaththukkup Pogap Purappattaan.

6 eesaakku Yaakkobai Aaseervadhiththu, Oru Pennaik Kollumpadi Avanaip Padhaan Araamukku Anuppinadhaiyum, Avanai Aaseervadhikkaiyil: Nee Kaanaaniyarudaiya Kumaaraththigalil Penkollavendaam Endru Avanukkuk Kattalaiyittadhaiyum,
7 yaakkobu Than Thagappanukkum Than Thaaikkum Keezhppadindhu, Padhaan Araamukku Purappattupponadhaiyum Esaa Kandadhinaalum,
8 kaanaaniyarudaiya Kumaaraththigal Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkin Paarvaikku Aagaadhavargal Enbadhai Esaa Arindhadhinaalum,
9 esaa Ismavelidaththukkup Poi, Thanakku Munnirundha Manaivigalumandri, Aabiragaamudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Ismavelin Kumaaraththiyum Nebaayoththin Sagodhariyumaagiya Magalaaththaiyum Vivaagampanninaan.
10 yaakkobu Peyersebaavai Vittup Purappattu Aaraanukkup Pogap Pirayaanampanni,
11 oru Idaththile Vandhu, Sooriyan Asdhamiththapadiyinaal, Ange Raaththangi, Avvidaththuk Karkalil Ondrai Eduththu, Than Thalaiyinkeezh Vaiththu, Ange Niththirai Seyyumpadi Paduththukkondaan.
12 ange Avan Oru Soppanam Kandaan; Idho, Oru Eni Boomiyile Vaikkappattirundhadhu, Adhin Nuni Vaanaththai Ettiyirundhadhu, Adhile Dhevadhoodhar Erugiravargalum Irangugiravargalumaai Irundhaargal.
13 adharku Melaagak Karththar Nindru: Naan Un Thagappanaagiya Aabiragaamin Dhevanum Eesaakkin Dhevanumaagiya Karththar; Nee Paduththirukkira Boomiyai Unakkum Un Sandhadhikkum Tharuven.
14 un Sandhadhi Boomiyin Thoolaippolirukkum; Nee Merkeyum, Kizhakkeyum, Vadakkeyum, Therkeyum Parambuvaai; Unakkullum Un Sandhadhikkullum Boomiyin Vamsangalellaam Aaseervadhikgappadum.
15 naan Unnode Irundhu, Nee Pogira Idaththilellaam Unnaik Kaaththu, Indhath Dhesaththukku Unnaith Thirumpivarappannuven; Naan Unakkuch Sonnadhaich Seyyumalavum Unnaik Kaividuvadhillai Endraar.
16 yaakkobu Niththirai Thelindhu Vizhiththapodhu: Meyyaagave Karththar Indha Sthalaththil Irukkiraar; Idhai Naan Ariyaadhirundhen Endraan.
17 avan Bayandhu, Indha Sthalam Evvalavu Bayankaramaayirukkiradhu! Idhu Dhevanudaiya Veeteyallaamal Veralla, Idhu Vaanaththin Vaasal Endraan.
18 adhikaalaiyile Yaakkobu Ezhundhu, Than Thalaiyinkeezh Vaiththirundha Kallai Eduththu, Adhaith Thoonaaga Niruththi, Adhinmel Enney Vaarththu,
19 andha Sthalaththirkup Beththel Endru Perittaan; Adharku Munne Avvoorukku Loos Ennum Per Irundhadhu.
20 appozhudhu Yaakkobu: Dhevan Ennode Irundhu, Naan Pogira Indha Vazhiyile Ennaik Kaappaatri, Unna Aagaaramum, Udukka Vasdhiramum Enakkuth Thandhu,
21 ennai En Thagappan Veettukkuch Samaadhaanaththode Thirumbivarappannuvaaraanaal, Karththar Enakkuth Dhevanaayiruppaar;
22 naan Thoonaaga Niruththina Indhak Kal Dhevanukku Veedaagum; Dhevareer Enakkuth Tharum Ellaavatrilum Umakkuth Dhasamapaagam Seluththuven Endru Sollip Poruththanaipannikkondaan.
